title: [$250] Reports - Violations are not visible on expense preview on "Top Spenders" section.

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you havenâ€™t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.97-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/78410 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** ibellicotest+2250@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Exploratory - Significant User Experience Deterioration **Device used:** Motorola MotoG60 / Android 12 (Hybrid app) - Windows 11 / Chrome **App Component:** Search ## Action Performed: Prerequisite: Account has at least one workspace. 1. Open the Expensify app. 2. Open any workspace chat. 3. Create a manual expense with date from last month. 4. Navigate to "Reports" > "Top Spenders" 5. Expand the results. 6. Long tap and select the just created expense. 7. Tap on dropdown menu and select "Hold" 8. Enter any reason and hold the expense. 9. Note that after expense is held, no message is visible on expense preview. 10. Open the expense. 11. Note that expense is correctly held. 12. Return to "Top Spenders" 13. Note that violation message is still not visible. ## Expected Result: Violations should be visible on preview of expenses while on "Top Spenders" section. ## Actual Result: After holding an expense while on "Top Spenders" section, no violation message appears on preview. Same behaviour is experienced in "Unapproved Cash" section. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/99ee700f-1ce6-4d2a-824c-57750719f218 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

## Overview This issue tracks miscellaneous accessibility issues that don't fit into other specific categories. ## Context Part of the accessibility improvement effort tracked in https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/575078 ## Issues to Fix - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77255 - Error message not associated with input *(link elements with accessibility props)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76951 - Plan details list has no list semantics *(add list role to container)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76914 - Data table has no table semantics *(add table accessibility props)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77573 - No feedback after requesting OTP *(add announcement via AccessibilityInfo)* ## Instructions **Suggested Fixes:** Various - see individual issues for specific fixes needed > **Note:** Discuss on Slack if you are unsure whether a sub-issue should be fixed or if you are unsure about the right fix / expected result. ## Overview This issue tracks elements that need accessibility labels added or updated to include meaningful information for screen reader users. ## Context Part of the accessibility improvement effort tracked in https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/575078 ## Issues to Fix - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77454 - Participant buttons don't announce remove purpose *(add "Remove [name]" to label)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77412 - Chat messages announced as 'chat message' *(include sender, time, message text)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77369 - Amount field doesn't announce currency *(include currency in label)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77365 - Status button announced without selected emoji *(dynamically include emoji or "not selected")* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77363 - 'Scan receipt' announced with redundant 'floating action' *(remove redundant text)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76906 - Switch button announced with incorrect name *(update aria-label to match visible label)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76905 - Step buttons not conveyed *(update aria-label to "Step 1", "Step 2", etc.)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74877 - Various buttons announce only option *(include visible name with value)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74868 - Distance field has no programmatic name *(add "distance (mi)" label)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74855 - Language combobox has no programmatic name *(add aria-label "Language selection")* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74853 - Social media links have no accessible names *(add aria-label for each: Twitter, Instagram, etc.)* ## Instructions **Suggested Fix:** Add or update accessibilityLabel to include meaningful information > **Note:** Discuss on Slack if you are unsure whether a sub-issue should be fixed or if you are unsure about the right fix / expected result. Ideally, create a single PR that will fix all the issues listed to minimize review time (more PRs only if necessary).

body:
## Overview This issue tracks color contrast accessibility problems that need to be fixed. Update color values for better contrast. ## Context Part of the accessibility improvement effort tracked in https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/575078 ## Issues to Fix - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77417 - Grey text fails contrast ratio against white background - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77408 - White text on green button fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77407 - White text on red buttons fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77406 - White icon of camera on green button fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77405 - White icon + on green fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77403 - Grey icons on bright grey fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77384 - White digits on orange fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77366 - Grey link arrow icons on white fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77332 - Bright grey progress bar on white fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76918 - Bright yellow on yellow fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76917 - White text on green fails contrast ratio - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76916 - White text on red fails contrast ratio ## Instructions **Suggested Fix:** Update color values for better contrast > **Note:** Discuss on Slack if you are unsure whether a sub-issue should be fixed or if you are unsure about the right fix / expected result. Ideally, create a single PR that will fix all the issues listed to minimize review time (more PRs only if necessary).

title: [$250] Refactor WorkspaceExpensifyCardPage loading component

labels.name: Reviewing
labels.description: Has a PR in review

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Weekly
labels.description: KSv2

body:
## Details

We recently improved the [FullscreenLoadingIndicator](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/69850#issuecomment-3542439439) by displaying a back button after 10 seconds to provide a recovery path in case of infinite loading. 

The [WorkspaceExpensifyCardPage](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/src/pages/workspace/expensifyCard/WorkspaceExpensifyCardPage.tsx) component appears to be a case where we should now be using `FullscreenLoadingIndicator` [instead](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/c99a23e84ff61ccd75fb0a9d02f0da1f7bf17599/src/pages/workspace/expensifyCard/WorkspaceExpensifyCardPage.tsx#L46-L49) of `ActivityIndicator`. It looks like we render this before `HeaderWithBackButton ` is displayed, so there is a chance that the user gets stuck. 

_Parent [issue](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/69850) with more context._

### Solution

Verify this is the case and refactor the component to use `FullScreenLoadingIndicator`. to provide an escape recovery mechanism for users.


<details><summary>Issue Owner</summary>Current Issue Owner: @akinwale</details>

body:
Coming from this conversation in [migrate](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C07NMDKEFMH/p1767873619904629). **Problem:** We've seen many users manually uploading receipts (mostly PDFs) that could have been emailed to receipts@ and scanned/automatically matched with card transactions. **Solution:** Update the empty receipt section of the RHP to educate users on the different routes for adding receipts to Expensify:

If you havenâ€™t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.96-4 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-2734/folder/13176702/41236790/1113100202 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** N/A **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Regression TC Execution **Device used:** Honor x6b/ ANdorid 14, Win 10 / Chrome **App Component:** Chat Report View ## Action Performed: Precondition: WS collect with an Employee, who submitted a manuall expense for more than 100$ 1. Log in as the Admin 2. Navigate to the report that was submitted 3. Click on the report to view the details 4. Click the approve button 5. Verify that there is an empty state receipt placeholder without a Plus icon and not clickable Result: The Plus icon is shown and it is clickable ## Expected Result: After the report is approved, the receipt section should display an empty receipt placeholder without a Plus icon and should be non-clickable. ## Actual Result: After approving the report, the receipt section still displays a Plus icon that is clickable. The Admin is able to click the icon and upload a receipt, which then triggers a violation message "Receipt and expense addded details manually" Merchant, date and reimbursable can modify. (If click Approve button at expense preview, merchant, date and reimbursable can't modify as expected) ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/35c6ad35-f515-4196-9a4f-01e5a4242322 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

body:
If you havenâ€™t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.96-4 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** Exploratory around https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-2733/folder/13177029/41237846/1113099870 & https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-2733/folder/13177029/41237847/1113099871 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** kiatest.80+ck18262@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Exploratory - Critical User Impact **Device used:** Windows 11/Chrome, iPhone 16/iOS 18.7.1 **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Prerequisites: 1. Create 2 new accounts User A (Creator) & User B (participant) with USD as a Payment currency 2. User A has created 2 IOU's with User B Steps: 1. Navigate to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Log in as User B (participant) 3. Navigate to IOU submitted by User A 4. Submit IOU to User A lesser than owed amount 5. Tap Pay button & observe Pay with Business account is not displayed 6. Log out & log in back as User B 7. Go to IOU report 8. Tap Pay button & observe Pay with Business account is displayed now 9. Select Pay with Business account 10. Observe Not here page opens 11. Navigate to IOU details page 12. Tap Pay button & observe Pay with BA option not displayed but the Pay button shows the workspace option 13. Navigate to IOU preview & tap Pay button 14. Observe Pay with BA option not displayed ## Expected Result: 1. If Pay with Business account is allowed while paying IOU, then on selecting that option should not lead to Not here page & no error should be displayed in workspace tab 2. Pay with BA option should always be displayed in both IOU preview & details page. It should not disappear when User B navigates to IOU details page while the Pay button shows option ## Actual Result: On step 6 - 10 : Pay with Business account option in IOU preview appears only after user B log out & log back in. Tapping on that option leads to Not here page & error displayed in workspace tab On step 11 - 14: On navigating to IOU details page, Pay with BA option is not displayed while the Pay button shows option. Only Pay with Personal account & Mark as Paid displayed in both IOU preview & details page ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/abb5dd0a-c74a-4403-aefa-a44fa49e3c5b [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
